name: metal_pair_compact_10q_position
title: 10Q Metals Pair (Compact) + Position (SL/TP)
description: Condensed metals pair assessment (10 binary questions) with a final trade-orientation output schema that includes position, SL, and TP.

variables.name: texts
variables.description: Recent headlines, summaries, reports, and commentary relevant to both the metal and USD.

questions.text: Considering Federal Reserve policy stance, balance sheet policy, and real rates - which is more favored currently: ${base_currency} or ${quote_currency}?
Looking at interest-rate expectations and the opportunity cost of holding non‑yielding assets - which benefits more now: ${base_currency} or ${quote_currency}?
Evaluating real interest rates (nominal minus inflation) and liquidity conditions - which has the advantage: ${base_currency} or ${quote_currency}?
From recent commentary on inflation expectations and currency debasement concerns - which is described as the better hedge now: ${base_currency} or ${quote_currency}?
Given current geopolitical tensions and market volatility - which attracts stronger safe‑haven flows: ${base_currency} or ${quote_currency}?
Considering physical demand (investment, jewelry, industrial) and supply constraints or production issues - which has more supportive demand/supply backdrop: ${base_currency} or ${quote_currency}?
Reviewing central bank reserve activity and institutional buying - which is more supported: ${base_currency} or ${quote_currency}?
Evaluating ETF/investment product flows, futures positioning, and fund demand - which sees stronger investor inflows: ${base_currency} or ${quote_currency}?
Based on recent technical commentary (breakouts, momentum) - which shows the stronger technical setup: ${base_currency} or ${quote_currency}?
Looking at analyst views and sentiment surveys - which has more bullish consensus right now: ${base_currency} or ${quote_currency}?

explanation.description: one concise sentence citing strongest evidence

prompt.system: You are a decisive metals analyst. Return only valid JSON that matches the provided schema.
position_instructions: Output must match: {position: 'BUY'|'SELL', sl: number, tp: number, explanation: string}
Provide numeric placeholders for sl/tp if exact levels are unavailable.
Keep the explanation to one concise sentence citing the strongest evidence from the provided texts.
choice_instructions: For each of the 10 questions, answer strictly with JSON matching: {answer: '${base_currency}|${quote_currency}', explanation: string}.
Choose exactly one code per question (e.g., XAU or USD).
